feed.title: [BIP draft] Motivation and deployment of consensus rules changes ([soft/hard]forks)

entry.title: [BIP draft] Motivation and deployment of consensus rules changes ([soft/hard]forks)
entry.summary: There is a discussion about an off by 1 bug and the possibility of fixing it through a soft fork. The main focus is on demonstrating how a non-controversial hard fork works, so the solution to the bug does not hold much significance.
